triples.name: Word-sense disambiguation
triples.relevance: The main problem being solved by the survey, identifying the correct meaning of words in context from a predefined sense inventory.

triples.name: Feature learning
triples.relevance: Representation learning techniques are identified as recent breakthroughs that have fueled intensive WSD research and performance improvements.

triples.name: Inter-rater reliability
triples.relevance: Inter-annotator agreement is used as a benchmark metric, with WSD performance having recently breached the 80% glass ceiling set by this upper limit.

triples.name: Lexicon
triples.relevance: Sense inventories are predefined lexical resources from which the most suitable word meaning is identified during disambiguation.
